publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-538# Carolyn Leckie: MMR Vaccine-That the Parliament recognises that the debate over the safety of the MMR vaccine is unresolved and considers that single vaccines, administered at intervals, should be available in Scotland as an alternative choice to MMR.
S2M-538# MMR Vaccine (lodged on 31 October 2003) John Swinburne*
S2M-538# MMR Vaccine (lodged on 31 October 2003) Fergus Ewing*
S2M-538# MMR Vaccine (lodged on 31 October 2003) Frances Curran*, Colin Fox*, Brian Adam*, Chris Ballance*, Ms Rosemary Byrne*, Alex Neil*, Ms Sandra White*, Mr Bruce McFee*, Campbell Martin*
S2M-538# MMR Vaccine (lodged on 31 October 2003) Tommy Sheridan*
S2M-538# MMR Vaccine (lodged on 31 October 2003) Linda Fabiani*
S2M-538# MMR Vaccine (lodged on 31 October 2003) Mr Adam Ingram*
S2M-538# MMR Vaccine (lodged on 31 October 2003) Shiona Baird*
S2M-538# MMR Vaccine (lodged on 31 October 2003) Dr Jean Turner*
S2M-538# MMR Vaccine (lodged on 31 October 2003) Elaine Smith*
